title: 23: How to Get Your Dream Job + Structure Your Esthetician Resume!
description:
Hi babes! It's a tess solo episode! Toay I'm talking about the art of the informatinal interview, how to structure a great resume, pitch yourself to potential employers, and everything that comes after that. Thank you for listening!

Xo, Tess & Lo

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Music by LiQwYd
